talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Today's maintenance check is complete.
The <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff> is operating
without issue.<sp:0:4:0>It is there if you need <clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I will be happy to provide additional
information on either if needed.
talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS_00>I will continue my maintenance checks.<sp:5:1:0>
This dispenser is available for use.
talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You can process resources that you hold
by dropping them into the receptacle.<sp:5:0:0>
It is similar to using a cooking pot.
talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh. I have lost track of time. It seems I
even missed the time bell.<sp:0:4:0>I will suspend my activities for now. <sp:5:0:0>The
dispenser remains available to be used.
talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I will be here in case you need to hear
these explanations again.
talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_01><clr:0000>Device dispenser <clr:ffff>operation confirmed.<sp:5:1:0>
On track to meet today's Zonai-capsule
production target.
talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS_00>I will suspend my activities again now.<sp:5:0:0>
The <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff> remains available
for your use.
talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>Do you plan to use the <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>You are welcome to do so. <sp:5:0:0>I have largely
achieved my objectives.
talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Though there is a problem. <sp:5:0:0>You seem to
lack an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>device dispenser <clr:ffff>will be no use to
you without one.<sp:0:4:0>Find an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff> as soon as you can. <sp:5:0:0>
I will then explain this mechanism to you.
talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have an associate by the shores of the
pond at the foot of the mountain. <sp:5:0:0>I believe
it should have a spare <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.
talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_01><clr:0000>Device dispenser <clr:ffff>operation confirmed.<sp:5:1:0>
On track to meet today's Zonai-capsule
production target.
talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh? Do you want to use the
<clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>I have nearly met my target. <sp:5:0:0>You are
welcome to use it.
talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It is pointless to use a <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff>
without an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Find an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff> as soon as you can. <sp:5:0:0>
I will then explain this mechanism to you.
talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughL_01>The hour seems to have grown late. <sp:5:1:0>I have
heard the time bell ring already.<sp:0:4:0>I am suspending activities for the time
being. <sp:5:0:0>Do not let this dissuade you from
asking assistance of me.
talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yes. This is a <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>
It produces Zonai capsules by
converting certain resources.<sp:0:4:0>The resources it accepts are things such
as <clr:0000>construct horns <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>Zonai charges<clr:ffff>.
talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I am taking my evening rest.<sp:0:4:0>You are free to use the <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff>
at any time.<sp:0:4:0>Though there is no point if you do not
have an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>You should acquire
one as soon as possible.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff> are portable Zonai devices
in convenient pocket form.<sp:0:4:0>A device cannot be put back in its capsule
after you have removed it. They are
intended to be disposable.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:SurpriseS_01>They are also plentiful. You can extract
many <clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff> from a single
<clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>There is no harm in converting your spare
resources into <clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff>. It ensures
you will always have a few.
talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Happy>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>You are in possession of an
<clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Allow me to explain briefly about this
<clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff>.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>The <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff> is yours to use
at any time. You need only feed it the
requisite materials.
talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_01>I am currently taking my nightly rest.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Happy>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>You are in possession of an
<clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Allow me to explain briefly about this
<clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff>.
talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Device dispensers<clr:ffff> produce portable Zonai
devices in the form of <clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>They can process <clr:0000>construct horns<clr:ffff> and
<clr:0000>Zonai charges<clr:ffff>.
talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The mechanism before you is a
<clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>It uses resources such as <clr:0000>construct
horns <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>Zonai charges <clr:ffff>to produce
<clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff>.
talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff> are portable Zonai devices
in convenient pocket form.<sp:0:4:0>A device cannot be put back in its capsule
after you have removed it. More capsules
are always available at <clr:0000>device dispensers<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Converting spare resources into <clr:0000>Zonai
capsules<clr:ffff> ensures you always have a few.
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You are welcome to use the <clr:0000>device
dispenser<clr:ffff> if you need Zonai <clr:0000>capsules<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I can explain how either of them work if
you need a primer.
talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Use them by dropping any resources held
in your hands into the receptacle. It is
similar to using a cooking pot.
talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It is easy to use. <sp:5:0:0>Simply hold the required
resources and drop them into the
receptacle. <sp:5:0:0>The dispenser does the rest.
talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff> are a form of portable
Zonai devices. They are immensely
convenient.<sp:0:4:0>I recommend that you actively convert
surplus resources into them. <sp:5:0:0>Then you
will always have some with you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:SurpriseS_01>A device cannot be returned to its
capsule once open. <sp:5:0:0>They are meant
to be disposable.<sp:0:4:0>Note that there is no need to hoard them.
The <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff> can produce many
<clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff> at once.
talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There are many types of <clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
I recommend carrying a few with you at
all times.
talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy>That explanation was not as brief as
advertised. My apologies. <sp:5:0:0>But I am willing
to repeat it if you want.
talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I am always available to explain the use of
<clr:0000>device dispensers<clr:ffff>.
